title: Simulation-Based Leadership Training for Enhancing Non-Technical Skills (NTS)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational management and communication experience
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals requiring improved decision-making and team collaboration skills in social crisis scenarios. Simulated environments utilize digital devices (tablets, projectors, etc.)

learning_goals: Learners enhance communication skills in crisis situations by 30% through four simulation scenarios.
Learners achieve over 80% collaboration performance scores in team-based simulation evaluations.
Learners demonstrate a two-level or higher improvement in their ability to develop risk management plans in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
